title: T205 Joss, Collins open mouth needed
author: zljones

posts.post_title: T205 Joss, Collins open mouth needed
posts.post_content: I am on the hunt for low grade T205 Addie Joss and Eddie Collins with the open mouth.  I am looking for grades A-1.5 for the Joss and 1-2 for the Collins.  I am not looking to pay way above market value that most people would pay so please keep that in mind.
